ARA  Cold whether brings challenges for both car and driver PERIOD If you take time to prepare and protect your vehicle you can save money and hassle later on PERIOD A few tips for vehicle winterization and safe travels this season



Clear vision Having full view of whats ahead and behind your vehicle at all times is vital so be sure to check your windshield wiper blades and washer fluid before winter precipitation hits PERIOD For colder climates where you may experience ice or frost you may want to keep a bottle of deicing windshield spray handy PERIOD Simply spray your icy windshield with the fluid turn on your vehicle defroster and your windows will clear quickly and easily PERIOD

Auto armor Did you know that within  days a small scratch or nick in a vehicles paint finish can rust Add some freezing temperatures and a small problem can quickly escalate to a larger more expensive one PERIOD Luckily fixing scratches is quick easy and affordable thanks to products such as DupliColors Scratch Fix 2in1 touchup paint PERIOD Available in thousands of colors to perfectly match your vehicles paint and featuring a patented applicator for precision and control anyone can achieve professional looking results that will repair and protect your vehicles appearance  and help you avoid an ugly problem next spring PERIOD

Tired out One of the most important aspects of winterization is ensuring you have a safe grip on the road PERIOD Like the soles of shoes that prevent you from slipping quality tires help keep your vehicle securely on the road especially in slippery rain or snow conditions PERIOD Checking tire tread and pressure is important to ensure you have optimal traction PERIOD If you live in a particularly snowprone or rural area you might also consider buying snow tires andor chains PERIOD

Engine protection Extreme temperatures can cause major issues in a vehicles engine so testing your coolant system before winter is very important PERIOD Checking the level and concentration of antifreeze in your vehicle could save you costly engine repair and should be done twice every year PERIOD Choose an extended life coolant for ultimate protection which can be used in nearly any year make or model vehicle worldwide PERIOD

Travel prepared In case something does happen to your vehicle this winter and youre stranded for an extended period of time its important to keep a few essential items on board PERIOD Assemble an emergency kit containing a blanket gloves ice scraper flares flashlight jumper cables and basic first aid items PERIOD Make sure to also carry a cell phone when you travel particularly if bad weather is expected PERIOD

With a few simple steps you can feel safe and secure for the cooler temperatures ahead PERIOD For more information on DupliColor products visit www.duplicolor.com PERIOD
